name: BBrowseForm
desc: BOA Browse Form. Using for listing and reporting proccesses. If it has any child, shows criteria panel and puts them on it.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: page
infoArray.desc: Reference of page which used this form.

infoArray.name: openedByDialog
infoArray.desc: Status of dialog opening. True when opened by BDialogHelper. Default false.

infoArray.name: criteriaPanelExpanded
infoArray.desc: Criteria pane expanded/collapsed status. Default true (expanded).

infoArray.name: criteriaPanelExpandable
infoArray.desc: Criteria pane can expandable status. Default true (expandable).

infoArray.name: criteriaPanelHeader
infoArray.desc: Criteria pane header button text. Default 'Criterias'.

infoArray.name: autogenerateColumns
infoArray.desc: Datagrid auto generate column ability. Default false.

infoArray.name: onActionClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when any action clicked.

infoArray.name: onClosing
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when current form is closing.

infoArray.name: onGridRowSelectionChanged
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when datagrid row selection changed event.
